#Liewlyweds

Story

We met during our senior year at NU through a mutual friend. As hungry and frugal college students, a group of us met at Bar Louie for $1 burger Tuesdays. We quickly hit it off and made plans to hang out again.

From there, we got to know each other through longboarding around campus, demolishing an entire tub of coffee ice cream in one sitting, sharing music playlists, and hanging out at the Lakefill. Our first “official” date was at Lincoln Park Zoo on a cold winter day-- we even ended up walking all the way downtown (and back...) but enjoyed each other’s company the whole time as we laughed and chatted.

After graduation, we were in a long-distance relationship for 3 (!) years as Steph was in Chicago and Mat was in Madison, WI. Mat later moved back to Chicago and, in Oct 2016, proposed to Steph by Navy Pier. Throughout the 6 years of our relationship, we’ve been blessed with meeting each other’s families and old and new friends. We are so thankful and excited to celebrate our wedding with you all!

Schedule

11:00AM

Ceremony

The ceremony will take place outdoors on the concrete patio next to the Lakeside Pavilion.

In case of inclement weather, the ceremony will be moved indoors within the hotel.

11:30AM

Cocktail Hour

The cocktail hour will take place at the same location as the ceremony.

12:30PM

Reception

The reception will be in the Lakeside Pavilion. Lunch will be served, followed by dancing! Please take advantage of our open bar ;-)

4:00PM

Informal After-Party

We recognize a lot of friends and family will be traveling in from out of town, so we'd love to use this time to catch up with you guys! Come and hang out with us at the hotel bar. Food and drinks will not be provided.

Accomodations

Lincolnshire Marriott Resort which is where our wedding will be held.

Click here to reserve a room with our wedding block under “Lo Liew Wedding” for a rate of $114/night. Our block rate will be available if you book by 7/27/2018. Complimentary on-site parking. This hotel does not provide shuttle service to/from the airports.

Registry

Above all, your presence is truly all the present we need. If you’d like to give us a gift to celebrate, monetary contributions towards our home and honeymoon would be greatly appreciated. Thanks so much!
